member.name: M:INF.Business.CtAutoPub.autoPublish(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Dim pent As INF.Business.CtAutoPub = New INF.Business.CtAutoPub(Me.DBManager, Me.LogUtil) pent.IS_DEBUG = "Y" '非必要(有設定出錯時會中斷程式，無則發mail通知系統管理員) pent.IS_BATCH = "Y" '若為排程必填(是Batch執行時以"Batch"寫入Create User/Update User與屬性PERSON_TYPE, DEP_CODE, LICENSE_NO_DATA, IS_ALL合用) pent.IS_ALL = Session("IS_ALL") pent.LICENSE_NO_DATA = Session("LICENSE_NO_DATA") pent.DEP_CODE = Session("DEP_CODE") pent.PERSON_TYPE = Session("PERSON_TYPE") pent.LICENSE_NO = "" '2014/02/17 改代入 LICENSE_NO PKNO pent.NUM_CODE = "101" '號碼子類別代碼，之後會查出號碼類別比對樣版 pent.NUM_CODE_NAME = "北北基" '號碼子類別名稱 pent.NUM_SUM = "12345" pent.USE_TYPE = "2" pent.PUB_DATE = Now.ToString("yyyy/MM/dd") pent.PAGE_NAME = "INF1070_02" pent.autoPublish()
